CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, November 30, 1957, pg. 1, reads: "Praying for Grandparents - The family of Mr. and Mrs. Joseph Sheard, of 880 Whiteside Rd., have been earnestly praying for the safety of the parents of Mrs. Sheard ever since the Rev. T. D. Wesley, the mother's father, was viciously beaten by a white mob near Siluria, Ala. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Joseph Sheard and his family praying for father of Mrs. Sheard, who was beaten by white mob in Alabama, in their living room 880 Whiteside Road, Bedford Dwellings, Hill District
